compute group averages

Source: R/tidyMS_Modelling_Deprec.R
contrasts_linfct_deprec.Rd

used in p2621, p2109

contrasts_linfct_deprec(
  models,
  linfct,
  subject_Id = "protein_Id",
  contrastfun = prolfqua::my_contest
)

Examples


modelSummary_A <- prolfqua::modellingResult_A
m <- get_complete_model_fit(modelSummary_A$modelProtein)

factor_contrasts <- linfct_factors_contrasts( m$linear_model[[1]])
factor_contrasts

#>                                    (Intercept) MortalityM1 InterventionINT
#> MortalityM0 - MortalityM1                    0          -1               0
#> InterventionCTRL - InterventionINT           0           0              -1
#> NRSNRS_3 - NRSNRS_4                          0           0               0
#> NRSNRS_3 - NRSNRS_5                          0           0               0
#> NRSNRS_4 - NRSNRS_5                          0           0               0
#>                                    NRSNRS_4 NRSNRS_5
#> MortalityM0 - MortalityM1                 0        0
#> InterventionCTRL - InterventionINT        0        0
#> NRSNRS_3 - NRSNRS_4                      -1        0
#> NRSNRS_3 - NRSNRS_5                       0       -1
#> NRSNRS_4 - NRSNRS_5                       1       -1

factor_levelContrasts <- contrasts_linfct( m,
        factor_contrasts,
        subject_Id = "Compound",
        contrastfun = prolfqua::my_contrast_V2)

#> computing contrasts.

#usethis::use_data(factor_levelContrasts, overwrite = TRUE)

models_interaction <- prolfqua::models_interaction

m <- get_complete_model_fit(models_interaction$modelProtein)
m$linear_model[[1]]

#> Linear mixed model fit by REML ['lmerModLmerTest']
#> Formula: formula
#>    Data: x
#> REML criterion at convergence: 530.0031
#> Random effects:
#>  Groups     Name        Std.Dev.
#>  patient_id (Intercept) 0.1933  
#>  peptide_Id (Intercept) 0.5491  
#>  Residual               0.8748  
#> Number of obs: 196, groups:  patient_id, 12; peptide_Id, 7
#> Fixed Effects:
#>               (Intercept)  Conditiondegenerative_IVD  
#>                   -1.9704                    -0.6870  
#>        ConditionIL_1_beta     Conditiontraumatic_IVD  
#>                   -0.1675                    -0.5371  
factor_contrasts <- linfct_factors_contrasts( m$linear_model[[1]])
factor_levelContrasts <- contrasts_linfct_deprec( m,
                           factor_contrasts,
                       subject_Id = "protein_Id")
head(factor_levelContrasts)

#> # A tibble: 6 x 14
#>   protein_Id lhs   estimate std.error    df statistic conf.low conf.high p.value
#>   <chr>      <chr>    <dbl>     <dbl> <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>   <dbl>
#> 1 sp|O43707~ Cond~    0.687     0.188  185.     3.66    0.317      1.06  3.28e-4

#> 3 sp|O43707~ Cond~    0.537     0.189  186.     2.84    0.164      0.911 5.06e-3
#> 4 sp|O43707~ Cond~   -0.519     0.172  183.    -3.01   -0.859     -0.179 2.94e-3

#> #   df.residual.model <dbl>, p.value.adjusted <dbl>
m$linear_model[[1]]

#> Linear mixed model fit by REML ['lmerModLmerTest']
#> Formula: formula
#>    Data: x
#> REML criterion at convergence: 530.0031
#> Random effects:
#>  Groups     Name        Std.Dev.
#>  patient_id (Intercept) 0.1933  
#>  peptide_Id (Intercept) 0.5491  
#>  Residual               0.8748  
#> Number of obs: 196, groups:  patient_id, 12; peptide_Id, 7
#> Fixed Effects:
#>               (Intercept)  Conditiondegenerative_IVD  
#>                   -1.9704                    -0.6870  
#>        ConditionIL_1_beta     Conditiontraumatic_IVD  
#>                   -0.1675                    -0.5371  
my_contest(m$linear_model[[1]], factor_contrasts )

#> # A tibble: 6 x 9
#>   lhs        estimate std.error    df statistic conf.low conf.high p.value sigma

plot(factor_levelContrasts$df, factor_levelContrasts$df.residual.model )

abline(c(0,1))

plot(factor_levelContrasts$df.residual.model , factor_levelContrasts$df - factor_levelContrasts$df.residual.model )
